item.title: 北达科他州发生破裂后，Keystone 石油管道被关闭
item.description: 北达科他州兰索姆堡（美联社）— Keystone 石油管道周二上午在北达科他州发生破裂，泄漏范围仅限于一片农田。【原文：FORT RANSOM, N.D. (AP) — The Keystone oil pipeline ruptured Tuesday morning in North Dakota, with the spill confined to an agricultural field.】

item.title: 萨默斯警告美国可能走向衰退，200 万人失业
item.description: 前财政部长劳伦斯-萨默斯（Lawrence Summers）警告说，美国现在很可能会走向衰退，由于目前正在实施的关税增加措施，可能会有 200 万美国人失业。【原文：Former Treasury Secretary Lawrence Summers warned that the US is now likely headed toward a recession, with potentially 2 million Americans put out of work, thanks to the tariff increases now in train.】

item.title: 格伦科尔前首席执行官格拉森伯格自2015年以来首次买入股票
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的全面关税政策引发股价暴跌后，格伦科尔公司（Glencore Plc）前首席执行官兼最大股东伊万-格拉森伯格（Ivan Glasenberg）十年来首次增持股份。【原文：Glencore Plc’s former chief executive officer and largest shareholder Ivan Glasenberg added to his stake for the first time in a decade after a share-price rout triggered by Donald Trump’s sweeping tariffs.】

item.title: 美国要求欧盟增加国防预算，意大利将国防预算提高至 2
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，意大利最迟将在 6 月底公布提高国防开支以达到北约目标的计划，以应对美国可能的脱离接触。【原文：Italy will reveal plans to raise defense spending to meet NATO’s target by the end of June at the latest as it responds to potential US disengagement, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 葡萄牙国家海洋局计划全面调整结构，考虑裁员
item.description: 葡萄牙电话公司 NOS SGPS SA 正计划彻底改革其组织结构，这是熟悉内情的人士透露的该公司拓展新业务和应对激烈竞争计划的一部分。【原文：NOS SGPS SA is planning to overhaul its organizational structure, part of the Portuguese phone company’s plan to expand into new businesses and keep up with tougher competition, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 贸易下滑削弱美国关税收入增幅
item.description: 新的预测显示，唐纳德-特朗普总统提高关税将导致美国贸易量下滑，这很可能会限制联邦政府有望获得的额外收入的范围。【原文：President Donald Trump’s tariff increases will cause a slump in US trade volumes that’s likely to limit the scope of the extra revenue the federal government can expect to reel in, new projections show.】

item.title: 黑客窃听 100 名美国银行监管者的电子邮件长达一年多
item.description: 据两位熟悉内情的人士称，黑客截获了约 100 名银行监管人员的电子邮件，时间长达一年多，获取的信息包含该机构的审议情况以及其监管银行的敏感细节。【原文：Hackers intercepted about 100 bank regulators’ emails for more than a year, gaining access to messages containing agency deliberations and sensitive details about banks it oversees, according to two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 贸易战增加了南非出售外国债券计划的成本
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统对美国大多数贸易伙伴征收对等关税引发风险资产抛售之后，如果南非继续执行外债举借计划，其付出的代价将大大超过最初的设想。【原文：South Africa will pay considerably more than it originally envisioned if it follows through on plans to raise foreign debt after President Donald Trump’s imposition of reciprocal tariffs on most of the US’s trading partners sparked a selloff of riskier assets.】

item.title: 摩根大通认为垃圾债券和私人放贷人债券将面临更多困难
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统不断演变的全球贸易战中，高收益债券出现了自 2020 年以来最严重的下滑，摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co：情况会变得更糟。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. has a warning for US debt investors after high-yield bonds saw the worst slump since 2020 amid President Donald Trump’s evolving global trade war: It’s about to get worse.】

item.title: 中美就 180 亿美元外汇掉期额度的争执让米莱陷入困境
item.description: 阿根廷领导人哈维尔-米莱突然被夹在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普和中国共产党政府之间，因为国际货币基金组织的新救援计划已接近终点。【原文：Javier Milei is suddenly caught between US President Donald Trump and China’s communist government as the Argentine leader nears the finish line on a new rescue package from the International Monetary Fund.】

item.title: 肯尼亚在关税忧虑中将关键利率下调幅度超过预期
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收对等关税导致地缘政治风险加剧的情况下，肯尼亚央行连续第五次下调基准利率，降息幅度超过预期。【原文：Kenya’s central bank cut its benchmark interest rate for the fifth time in a row, slashing the rate by more than expected amid heightened geopolitical risks from US President Donald Trump’s reciprocal tariffs.】

item.title: 部长称苹果去年从印度出口了 170 亿美元的 iPhone 手机
item.description: 印度技术部长周二表示，苹果公司在上一财年从印度出口了超过 1.5 万亿卢比（约合 174 亿美元）的 iPhone 手机，这凸显了该公司为摆脱中国市场实现多元化所做的努力。【原文：Apple Inc. exported more than 1.5 trillion rupees ($17.4 billion) in iPhones from India in the last fiscal year, the nation’s technology minister said Tuesday, underscoring the company’s efforts to diversify away from China.】

item.title: 马斯克称纳瓦罗为 "白痴"，特朗普关税口水战愈演愈烈
item.description: 亿万富翁、总统顾问埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）抨击白宫贸易顾问彼得-纳瓦罗（Peter Navarro）"比一袋砖头还笨"，周二，一场关于唐纳德-特朗普总统关税制度的争论在社交媒体上蔓延开来。【原文：Billionaire presidential adviser Elon Musk attacked White House trade counselor Peter Navarro as “dumber than a sack of bricks” as a fight over President Donald Trump’s tariff regime spilled onto social media on Tuesday.】

item.title: 印度证券监管机构认为关税暴跌未引发系统性风险
item.description: 印度证券市场监管机构相信，股市能够抵御美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战带来的剧烈波动，并将系统风险降至最低。【原文：India’s securities market regulator is confident that the stock market can withstand the spike in volatility arising from US President Donald Trump’s trade war, with minimal risk to the system.】

item.title: 联邦存款保险公司代理主席表示将放宽银行的生前遗嘱要求
item.description: 联邦存款保险公司代理主席特拉维斯-希尔（Travis Hill）表示，该机构将放弃银行所谓生前遗嘱中的一项要求，使其不再围绕假设的倒闭情况而建立。【原文：Travis Hill, acting chair of the Federal Deposit Insurance Corp., says the agency will waive a requirement in banks’ so-called living wills so they’re no longer built around a hypothetical failure scenario.】

item.title: 丹麦克朗下滑，引发央行采取行动的预期
item.description: 过去几天的全球股市暴跌已将丹麦克朗推到了自 "科威德-19 "大流行以来的最弱水平，这增加了丹麦中央银行介入以捍卫其货币与欧元挂钩的可能性。【原文：A global stock-market meltdown over the past days has pushed the Danish krone to its weakest level since the onset of the Covid-19 pandemic, increasing the likelihood of Denmark’s central bank stepping in to defend its currency peg to the euro.】

item.title: 头条机器人和流动性紧张放大了股票的剧烈波动
item.description: 由于流动性稀缺和头条新闻驱动的算法交易机器人的共同作用，股市目前特别容易出现剧烈波动。【原文：The stock market is particularly vulnerable to wild swings right now due to a combination of thin liquidity and headline-driven algorithmic trading bots.】

item.description: 交易员在纽约证券交易所大厅工作。摄影师：迈克尔-纳格尔/布鲁姆伯格【原文：Traders work on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange. Photographer: Michael Nagle/Bloomberg】

item.title: 中国称其拥有充足的政策工具来抵消外部影响
item.description: 中国国务院总理李强表示，尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）发出了最新的关税威胁，但中国有充足的政策工具来 "完全抵消 "任何负面的外部影响，并重申他对世界第二大经济体 2025 年的增长持乐观态度。【原文：Chinese Premier Li Qiang said his country has ample policy tools to “fully offset” any negative external impacts, and reiterated his optimism about the growth of the world’s second-largest economy in 2025, despite the latest tariff threat from US President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 在对冲基金同行中获胜的经济学家遭大跌重创
item.description: 最近几天，关税引发的市场震荡来势凶猛，就连华尔街速度最快、最精通技术的一些投资者也未能幸免。【原文：The tariff-induced shock unleashed on markets in recent days has been so ferocious that even some of Wall Street’s fastest and most tech-savvy investors have been unable to escape.】

item.title: 尽管是避风港，但小额贷款公司却意外地迎来了 31 年来最糟糕的一天
item.description: 周一，关税引发的一波抛售压力冲击了市政债券市场，导致市场出现了三十多年来表现最差的一天。【原文：A wave of tariff-induced selling pressure hit the municipal bond market on Monday, leading to the worst-performing day in more than three decades.】

item.title: 摩根大通称欧洲央行将在未来四次会议上因关税问题降息
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase）分析师表示，随着美国关税带来的经济成本增加，欧洲央行将在接下来的四次会议上降息。【原文：The European Central Bank will cut interest rates at its next four meetings as the economic costs of US tariffs mount, according to analysts at JPMorgan Chase.】

item.title: 追涨者蜂拥而至，美股反弹遭遇质疑
item.description: 在经历了五年来最大的三日溃败之后，美国股票期货周二大幅飙升，原因是出现了自大流行病肆虐以来最严重的超卖状况，而且人们乐观地认为特朗普政府将淡化其苛刻的关税制度。【原文：US stock futures soared Tuesday after the biggest three-day rout in five years, fueled by the most oversold conditions since the depths of the pandemic and optimism the Trump administration will water down its harsh tariff regime.】

item.title: 奥特曼支持的普拉西斯公司为科技乌托邦基地考察基辅和雅典
item.description: Praxis 是一个自称为 "主权网络 "的组织，由硅谷投资者提供资金，目前正在世界某个地方寻找至少 10,000 英亩（40.5 平方公里）的土地来建设其第一个城市。【原文：Praxis, a self-described “sovereign network” funded by Silicon Valley investors, is looking for at least 10,000 acres (40.5 square kilometers) somewhere in the world to build its first city.】

item.title: 任天堂 Switch 2 销量预测因特朗普关税问题遭研究人员下调
item.description: 研究机构DFC Intelligence以美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收关税的不确定性为由，下调了任天堂公司即将推出的Switch 2视频游戏机2025年全球销量预测。【原文：Researcher DFC Intelligence cut its 2025 global forecast for sales of Nintendo Co.’s upcoming Switch 2 video-game console, citing uncertainty over tariffs imposed by US President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 欧洲监管机构在关税动荡中审查银行流动性
item.description: 在美国征收巨额贸易关税的前景激怒全球市场之后，欧洲监管机构正在仔细检查银行的流动性。【原文：European regulators are scrutinizing the liquidity of banks after the prospect of steep US trade tariffs roiled markets around the world.】

item.title: 亿万富翁艾伦-凯斯滕鲍姆利用财富竞聘美国钢铁公司首席执行官
item.description: 在乔-拜登（Joe Biden）总统任期的最后几天，美国钢铁公司以 141 亿美元收购日本买家新日本制铁公司（Nippon Steel Corp.【原文：United States Steel Corp. has faced an uncertain future since its $14.1 billion takeover by Japanese buyer Nippon Steel Corp. was blocked in the waning days of Joe Biden’s presidential term.】
